      Keith and Ian This method returns void, but takes an empty ArrayList of MapHex objects to be filled (by reference) during the recursive calls of this method.
      static boolean MovementCalculator.isEnemyOccupiedHex(MapHex destinationHex, MoveableUnit movingUnit)
      Keith and Ian This method takes a possible destination hex and a unit, who's valid moves are being calculated, and determines if there are enemy units in that hex.
